formatted_address: NO 37, PUSAT PERDAGANGAN ION, 3, Persiaran Medini Sentral 5, 79250 Iskandar Puteri, Johor Darul Ta'zim, Malaysia
name: Hotstec Performance

reviews.text:
Visit Hotstec while my trip to Legoland. Alex is friendly, he able to tune my Harrier MCU35 after a lot of workshop refused to do it with multiple reason.
Driving experience is much better, smooth acceleration, and most importance the throttle response was improve compare to before.
Recommended & trusted.

My car has already changed to an aftermarket air filter and exhaust system. Previously, my car felt heavy during initial acceleration and when trying to overtake other vehicles. The engine was quite loud, and there was some vibration. I went to HT ECU Tuning to get an explanation from Bro Alex and had my car tuned. Now, the engine is quieter, gear shifts are smoother, and at low speeds, the car doesn‚Äôt lose power. "Just press the pedal, and there's power." Thanks, Bro Alex, for tuning my car. It's so much fun to drive now... (I use a Myvi Gen 3 2020).
New Axia ,  ecu tuning throttle response üëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèª good service & good price in jbüëçüèª
